posts.headline: Highland Park Brewery
posts.body: Highland Park Brewery is a nice surprise with both great beer and delicious food, there is something everyone can enjoy at this brewery
posts.author: Yvonna Contreras

posts.headline: RPM IPA
posts.body: This solid IPA from Boneyard Brewery is a go-to in any occasion, although typically paired with a meal as it is heavy!
posts.author: Jared Beckler & Yvonna Contreras

posts.headline: Habanero Sculpin
posts.body: This sculpin packs a serious heat and will burn going down (in an oh-so-good way), be brave and you shall be rewarded!
posts.author: Jared Beckler
